summary.span: 在 ASP.NET 应用程序中配置基于密码的身份验证。

span.span: Configures Passport-based authentication in ASP.NET applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 类，可以访问和配置由标记标识的 Machine.config 或 Web.config 配置文件中的节点 `passport` 。The class allows you to access and configure a node in the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file identified by the `passport` tag. 此类型是包含 、和类型的组的一部分 。This type is part of a group that includes the , , and types. > [!NOTE] > 类只能在计算机、站点或应用程序级别向配置文件的相关部分写入信息。The class can write information into the related section of the configuration file at machine, site, or application level only. 尝试在层次结构中的不同级别上写入配置文件将导致分析器生成错误消息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a different level in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 您可以使用此类在层次结构中的任何级别上读取配置信息。You can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 从现有 Web 应用程序的配置文件中获取该对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. 还显示了一个配置示例。Also shown is a configuration example. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PassportAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PassportAuthentication/CS/passportauthentication.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PassportAuthentication#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PassportAuthentication/VB/passportauthentication.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ RedirectUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.RedirectUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置请求被重定向到的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to which the request is redirected.

value.span: 请求被重定向到的页的 URL。

span.span: The URL of the page to which the request is redirected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要 passport 身份验证，并且用户尚未使用 passport 身份验证登录，则指定必须将请求重定向到的页的 URL。The specifies the URL of the page to which the request must be redirected if Passport authentication is required and the user has not signed on using Passport authentication. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PassportAuthentication#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PassportAuthentication/CS/passportauthentication.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PassportAuthentication#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PassportAuthentication/VB/passportauthentication.vb#3)]
